rooms.description: A welcoming entrance with open layout adhering to Vastu principles ensuring positive energy flow and natural lighting.
Spacious living area adjacent to the kitchen, designed for family gatherings while ensuring privacy from servant's quarters. Natural light and ventilation are prioritized.
Modern kitchen equipped with essential facilities. The layout ensures ease of movement and integration with the dining area. Vastu guidelines suggest placement in an auspicious direction.
Adjacent to the kitchen for efficient service and meal preparation areas. The room is designed for both formal dining and casual meals with adequate seating arrangements.
Main bedroom ensuring ample space and privacy, placed in the north-east direction as per Vastu to invite positive energy. Includes built-in closets and natural light openings.
Well-equipped bathroom adjacent to master bedroom with proper ventilation and water drainage in accordance with local building norms.
Dedicated workspace designed for quiet and focus. Placed away from high-traffic areas to maintain a conducive environment for work while ensuring natural light as per Vastu.
Compact yet functional living space for domestic help. Located in the southwest corner to avoid interference with main dwelling spaces while maintaining privacy and ease of access.
A versatile outdoor area that can be used as an extended living space, designed in keeping with Vastu principles to enhance relaxation and connectivity with nature.
Integrated storage solutions within living spaces for efficient organization, complying with local building codes and norms.

openings.description: A wide door enabling smooth transition between public and private areas while controlling light and ventilation.
Large windows strategically placed for natural lighting, air circulation, and energy efficiency. Placement ensures minimal direct sunlight in bedrooms per Vastu guidelines.
Functional door facilitating easy movement of food items and maintaining a cohesive design between kitchen and dining space.
